channel.title: explaination on VPN + whonix
channel.description:
If my desktop is running a non loggin vpn and then I boot up the whonix gateway and work station via virtual box does that provide any more security to a point?
my router runs a vpn via dd-wrt. I was always under the impression that stacking a vpn and tor etc could give you a little more security only to a point.

item.description:
